verbose_text: Expression of the toxin genes was induced with 0.2% arabinose for 3 h. Cultures were then standardized and incubated with 100xMIC of ciprofloxacin or 100xMIC of ceftazidime for 24 h. E. coli expressing the toxic G14C, S23A or P41A alleles had persister frequencies similar to the positive hicA control strain following ciprofloxacin or ceftazidime treatment (XREF_FIG c and 6d respectively).
